name: Neurotypical
description:
Step into the shoes of a neurotypical protagonist and experience the tension-filled world of our action horror puzzle game. As you solve puzzles and unravel the mystery, you'll be faced with choices that will shape the outcome of the story. each decision you make will have real consequences, leading to multiple endings that will keep you on the edge of your seat. This is not just an ordinary horror game, it's a game that will challenge your problem-solving skills and test your nerves. Get ready to face the unknown and enter a world unlike any you've seen.
Because the game isn't as typical as it seems...
